delete.question: Are you sure you want to delete Product {{ id }}?

help.source: Specifying source if product is imported, preferably url address if possible
help.authorId: Author of product if product created or edited manually. Id of User entity retrieved from gateway service
help.description: Short description of Product in a language of a product
help.isFinal: Flag specifying if product is final or editable
help.isVerified: Flag specifying if product is verified. All products retrieved from external sources should be checked for eligibility to use and therefore initially this flag is set to false for these.
help.language: Language tag of a product as ISO_639-1 code

productsProduct.created: A new Product is created with identifier {{ param }}
productsProduct.updated: A Product is updated with identifier {{ param }}
productsProduct.deleted: A Product is deleted with identifier {{ param }}
